item.title: How to Deploy a Static Website to GitHub Pages for Free
item.description: Step-by-step guide to launching your static site on GitHub Pages without spending a dime. Perfect for Hugo, Jekyll, or any static generatorâ€”covers setup, custom domains, and troubleshooting from a tech journalist who&#39;s done it dozens of times.
